=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 11 hours -
22 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 7 hours 20 mins -
14 hours 40 mins || 88 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 4 hours 53 mins 20 secs -
9 hours 46 mins 40 secs || 59 mulch |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
